item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Was October 2024’s Best-Selling Game
item.content:encoded:
https://insider-gaming.com/call-of-duty-black-ops-6-october-2024-best-selling-game/

In what should come as no surprise to anyone, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 was the best-selling video game in the United States for October 2024.

The news comes via the latest sales data from Circana.

As far as other games on the list, nine games appeared on the list for the very first time after having been released during the month. The debuting games include: Black Ops 6, Dragon Ball: Sparking Zero, Silent Hill 2, Undisputed, Metaphor: ReFantazio, Dragon Age: The Veilguard, Super Mario Party Jamboree, Sonic X Shadow Generations, and Life is Strange: Double Exposure.

One new addition to the list that is sure to stand out is Undisputed. The first major console boxing game in over a decade found its way to number four on the best-selling games of the month.

RELATED: Despite Call of Duty Release, College Football 25 Is Still The Best-Selling Game Of 2024

With so many new additions to the list, that meant a number of games had to fall out. Leaving the list from September’s best-selling games were Star Wars: Outlaws, God of War: Ragnarok, Dead Rising, Final Fantasy XVI, Marvel vs. Capcom Fighting Collection: Arcade Classics, Age of Mythology, Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2, Ghost of Tsushima, and the EA Sports MVP Bundle.

You can check out the full list of the best-selling games from October 2024 below.

Top 20 Best-Selling Games For October 2024

  1. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
  2. Dragon Ball: Sparking! Zero
  3. Silent Hill 2 (2024)
  4. Undisputed
  5. Metaphor: ReFantazio
  6. Dragon Age: The Veilguard
  7. Super Mario Party Jamboree
  8. Madden NFL 25
  9. Sonic X Shadow Generations
  10. EA Sports FC 25
  11. EA Sports College Football 25
  12. The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom
  13. Hogwarts Legacy
  14. NHL 25
  15. Astro Bot
  16. Minecraft
  17. NBA 2K25
  18. Life is Strange: Double Exposure
  19. Final Fantasy I-VI Bundle
  20. Elden Ring

What do you think of Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 being the best-selling game for October 2024? Do any other games on the list surprise you? Let us know down below, and join the discussion in the official Insider Gaming forums.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the latest on the Splinter Cell Remake from Ubisoft. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
